headline: BofA upgrades Dollar General on improved visibility on retailer’s recovery path
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America upgraded Dollar General (NYSE:DG) to "Overweight" from "Marketweight," saying it sees improved visibility on the retailer’s recovery path.
